channel.title: Trance / house music
channel.description:
Hello Im looking for good house and trance music. Seeing as I know nearly nothing about it besides that I like the music, could someone tell me about good compilations to download?
ill also take jumpstyle
no hardstyle plz

item.title: Trance / house music
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I don’t know about compilations and such, but I’ve got a lot of stuff from musicians like Andain, Chicane, Faithless, DJ Tiesto, BT, and so on.

As far as house music goes, The Bloody Beetroots are apparently quite good (from what I’ve heard), Deadmau5.
I downloaded a collection titled ‘Top 100 Trance And Techno Party Songs Of All Time Vol. 3’, and it had a reasonable amount of good stuff.

Forgot Darude.

Read full topic

item.title: Trance / house music
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

lsdb has a large, well up-kept, diverse selection. Tracklists are also usually present with a release and the members are courteous and prompt about filling requests. Only downside is that they like to speak in Dutch.

Read full topic

item.title: Trance / house music
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

house music: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BrTB74D2e-Y&feature=related

also try lsbd.eu for sets

Read full topic

item.title: Trance / house music
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Stork, post:7, topic:322166”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=418587.msg3080248#msg3080248 date=1262110146]

what’s the difference between hardstyle and jumpstyle? [unaware]

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2009, 12:02:03 pm[/size][hr]try deadmau5 - I Remember, that’s a prime example of mainstream vocal trance.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyAvaLsLFl8 <-- jumpstyle(ignore the shitty jumping around)

http://www.last.fm/music/Feronzono/_/Quick%2BHardstyle%2BSet%2B%231?autostart <-- good hardstyle, most of the songs in the set are <2004 (when hardstyle was good)
[/quote]
can’t skip the intro in the set you linked, but the beginning bit sounded a lot like jumpstyle, I still don’t get it.[/quote]
Yeah that track (The KGB’s - Punk Cake (Original Mix)) is a old jump-like track. If you listen to the entire set, you’ll start to understand the true (old) Dutch/Italian hardstyle sound.

Read full topic

item.title: Trance / house music
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Jumpstyle is (depending on where you are from) a very common style of dancing to hardstyle…

Read full topic
